scripts.test:pack: node dist/index.js pack test.pak dist/index.js src/index.ts
scripts.test:compare: cmp dist/index.js test-output/dist/index.js && cmp src/index.ts test-output/src/index.ts && echo 'passed'
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:pack && npm run test:unpack && npm run test:compare
